name: Ghost Ninja (itch)
description:
Ghost ninja is a stealth based game where you have to escape from a enemy mansion.  Your a ninja to went on a mission and got stuck in a enemy mansion. To escape the the mansion you have to go through 3 door.  You have to find the keys for the doors and escape. You are not just  a typical ninja you have the ability to tap into the spirit world and become a ghost but you cannot travel far from your physical body. When you become a ghost be carful about you physical state. 

This is my first game for a game jam and the first finished project :-). Appreciate if you can give a feedback.

Controls 

WASD - move

E - turn on ghost mode

LMB - kill (only in ghost mode)
